reviews.review_msg: Honestly the best professor I've ever had in any course. Guldana prioritizes engagement and students actually learning, rather than emphasizing grades. As a result, she's a very fair marker and aims to make sure her students get good grades! Truly heartbroken she will not be staying at SFU, professors will her kindness and passion are rare

I took Guldana's class without knowing anything about her or the topics. I am so glad I took her class and left the semester feeling inspired to learn more. She is very understanding and has a real passion for the topics she is teaching. She is not an overly hard marker and gives plenty of opportunities to succeed. Wish she was staying at SFU!

Dr. Nye is an intellegent & charasmatic professor, but I was disappointed in her teaching style. The lecture changed from in person/online randomly & with short warning. She cancelled two classes for no reason last minute (once because it was a nice day) & still had us read slides/ do the in class work. I didn't pay to take a self-directed class.

I really loved Coleman when I took Critical Disability Studies as a special topics GSWS course in Spring 2017 (she now has it as a full course!). A lot of the reading materials were really eye-opening and Coleman was great at facilitating discussion. She also organized a potluck lunch thing for us at the end of the semester which was really nice!

Easy class and good professor. She makes everything clear and expects nothing less. This class doesn't require a lot of work and is easy to get a good grade in without trying. Lectures got boring because they were 4 hours long and mostly consisted of class presentations. But overall, I wouldn't mind taking a class with this professor again .

Really nice lady but should not be teaching a full course, in my opinion. Being a summer online course during the pandemic, you would expect a professor to take some initiative to make sure their students were aware of the due dates, etc; this was not the case with Joy. Also avoided setting up Zoom meetings and only sent a few emails in 4 months.
WORST PROF EVER. NEVER TAKE THIS CLASS.
